Reviews.Title: “Great location!!”
Reviews.Author: Jenny091212
Reviews.Content: Absolutely LOVE staying at this hotel. It's right in the middle of all the action- literally steps away from all the awesome bars on Duval. The staff is great, rooms are always super clean, and they opened up a great little bar on the terrace with drinks and tapas! Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: “Great location & price”
Reviews.Author: vsattui123
Reviews.Content: If you are loooking for a place foro a good price and a great location then this is it. The entrance is on Southard Street just a few feet away from Duval. There is a loading zone on Southard by the hotel entrance when you check-in. You then must move your car to their free parking lot which is a block away just south of Duval and on the other side of the street. Since parking is at a premium this is a consideration. The rooms were average with a small pool on the second floor. The pool area was nice. The staff was very nice. This is not an upscale hotel by any means but you can't beat the price or location.

Reviews.Title: “Great Times in Key West”
Reviews.Author: Stan D
Reviews.Content: I and my girlfriend stayed over in Pegasus International Hotel last week for 4 nights. The stay was relaxing, but short! :( We really enjoyed the hotel and the staff was very helpful, rooms were clean, and location is incredible for the price. Would definitely recomend this hotel to my friends and family! If you will stay at this hotel you will not regret it.

Reviews.Title: “The Best Value on Key West Island”
Reviews.Author: thom37
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend and I are a few years beyond Spring Break age, but the first time we were each able to take vacation in 2012 was in fact Spring Break...for many MANY other people. Key West is by far my favorite place, and coming from New York, avoidance of driving and riding in taxis is a primary vacationing priciple for me. So, we chose the Pegasus based on location and rate. The price was more than reasonable and the central Duval Street placement was perfect. We are of course interested in the restaurants, bars, and shops of Duval Street, as well as the Sunset Celebration at Mallory Square and all the other historical sites and beautiful walks of Key West Island. The Pegasus provides excellent proximity to all of these things. It is even quite close to Louie's Backyard (if you don't know- make a reservation and find out). But, keeping in mind the obnoxiously loud Spring Breakers, the Pegasus is far enough away from the main attractions that sleep is an actual possibility. In addition, for first time Key West visitors, walking back to the Pegasus at night is a safe option as it is right in the main part of town which is patrolled and distant enough from any dangerous areas. Upon arrival, the front desk clerk requested an additional $300 cash deposit which we were not aware of prior to this point. We soon realized that this was standard practice as a way to deter Spring Breakers from destroying the room. Not a big deal, but be ready and ask before you go. The hotel and room were spotless and innocuously decorated. The staff was very friendly and efficient. There is a parking lot nearly across the street available exclusively to hotel customers if you drive yourself there as we did. It costs and extra $10 per night- this is less than any other parking lot in the area and it is safe. All in all, the Pegasus is an excellent choice for an affordable place to stay in Key West and it will satisfy all those who seek all the island has to offer in a clean, safe, and friendly environment.

Reviews.Title: “Good location - middle of Duval Street - older rooms”
Reviews.Author: FloridaMainers
Reviews.Content: This was the first place we ever stayed at when going to Key West. We stayed with another couple so we were looking for a central location to party and not have to walk too far. Pool on the roof along with a hot tub was a bonus. You can sit on the roof top and look down and people watch. (the roof top bar was closed the 2 nights we stayed there) The door opening to the rooms on the top floor (pool level) was extremely small. We had a difficult time to bring our cooler into the room because of that. My friend said "Thank god she wasn't too much bigger, she wouldn't have fit in the doorway". Our bathroom was newely tiled and renovated but the room was run down with an older rug and beds were just ok. We just wanted a centrally located cheaper place to stay while visiting for the first time, and that's what we got. We did further research and have since stayed at The Southern Most Hotel. The cheaper of the 3 Southern Most properties and we love it. It's further away from all the action, but quiet part of Duval Street. Read my review of that property. Enjoy The Florida Keys :)

Reviews.Title: “Kind of a Dump, Good location and Value Though”
Reviews.Author: Nomadic_Iowan
Reviews.Content: Place is pretty outdated and busted up. Last stayed here in 2011 and it was nothing to write home about but the rate was very good. Room interior sucked, old and crusty bedding and shabby air-con. Location of both the room and hotel was phenomenal though, we had a corner room on the 3rd floor right at Duval and Southard. If in a pinch for budget travel to KW, I would crash here again but would never give this place a 4-5* review as it is in desperate need of an overhaul.

Reviews.Title: “Love this place”
Reviews.Author: Capo M
Reviews.Content: Worth every Dollar.Excellent location, good service.Rooom,bathrooms and bedd-sheets are very clean.Everything really impressive.At the front desk,Svetlana is very helping.Great place for couples and families.I hope they maintain these excellent qualities.Will definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Boutique Hotel at its Best!”
Reviews.Author: Jason S
Reviews.Content: Best Boutique Hotel in downtown Key West with an incredible location for sun and fun and nightlife! A romantic hotel adventure or college reunion, come and enjoy affordable room rates and service second to none! The Pegasus Hotel in Key West delivers an experience to remember...right honey?;-) Thanks all!

Reviews.Title: “Loved it.”
Reviews.Author: hoopdog
Reviews.Content: GREAT location, but still quiet (we requested and got a room on the top floor, back side). Paid their parking rate and didn't move the car once - great to be able to walk everywhere. Hotel is older, but well decorated, clean and cared for.

Reviews.Title: “Greatest Place in Key West!!!”
Reviews.Author: jbrentlyons
Reviews.Content: If I cant stay at the Pegasus I basically don't want to go to Key West. It is that far and above every other place I've seen!!

Reviews.Title: “another great Key West trip”
Reviews.Author: Kristy95
Reviews.Content: We had a great time!!!! Location & staff are wonderful. Rooms are very spacious & clean. Cant wait to come back. I would recommend this to friends & family : )

Reviews.Title: “Great place!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Stefan S
Reviews.Content: In the heart of Duval Str, close to all main attractions, great service, with friendly stuff, beautifull pool on the terrace, breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Good times at the Pegasus International Hotel in Key West”
Reviews.Author: roy w
Reviews.Content: We had a very pleasant four night stay at this hotel. Due to booking needs we had to be in two rooms but it was not a problem. We started out in 212 and ended up in 214 for the last two nights. 214 was certainly quieter but lacking the outdoor window to the street. Note that it was a noisy street at late night so 214 would be better for light sleepers. The bed in 214 was also bigger and plusher, yielding a much better night's sleep. With some humor, the TV in 212 was too large for the room, and 214 kind of small! Neither were a problem while checking the morning news for a few minutes. The bathrooms of both rooms were surprisingly great. All new tile work much more typical of a high end hotel. They were alse extremely spacious. The rooms and bedding were very clean and we had no concerns in that aspect. With the continental breakfast which was in an excellent space and of very high quality was also a great time and money saver. Their elevator saved some steps on my aged knees too. The front desk is manned 24/7 with very nice staff too. They were helpful to answer any question or make recommendations. The location of the hotel is excellent! The parking was up the street but not a problem. The visit started off kind of cold so we did not use the rooftop pool, but the hot top was great at working out the kinks of travel! Overall, a great lodging value. I recommend this hotel for anyone visiting the heart of town. If you want quieter, suggest you stay away from downtown.

Reviews.Title: “Uptight Reservations”
Reviews.Author: mike k
Reviews.Content: Called the hotel because I had heard good things from fellow fishermen about the location to the docks. Spoke with a reservation person who was of french accent and did not give her name. When I asked about rates for a specific day, for which I was bringing a large fishing party down for a tournement, and we would be taking at least 6 if not more rooms, she said they had the availabilty and quoted a price per room plus tax. However, when I inquired if they had a special group rate for a certain number of rooms, like most estabilishments do that we have booked with across the world, I was told in her condesending accent, that this was the rate, if we wanted to book it, then book it, if not then don't. We didn't and decided to go with the competitor basically across the street, whom cost almost twice as much, but was customer friendly. We fish tournements around the world for a living and charter our fleets the rest of the time. The one thing we all understand is customer service. Obviously, this hotel doesn't. Too bad. Our group stops here for money tournements at least twice a year.

Reviews.Title: “We enjoyed it”
Reviews.Author: KJfromOhio
Reviews.Content: This was our first time at this hotel. Last time was a similar location but more expensive place. You definitely don't have any plush amenties but it gave us exactly what we were looking for - a basic room in the middle of Duval with an great deck to get some sunshine. I would recommend it for those looking for a reasonably priced hotel on Duval. Be aware that there are definitely stairs involved for certain rooms so you need to be prepared for that

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: lymac7
Reviews.Content: Pegasus' location is perfect. Our room was on the small side, but clean and the bed was very comfortable. I definitely recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Won't be back”
Reviews.Author: Chollie17
Reviews.Content: Hard to believe I stayed at same place as other reviewers. Great location and nice rooftop deck with small pool. Room was dirty with old used towels still on bathroom floor and a soaking wet rug that was sorely in need of replacement. Maid service unreliable, showed up once during a 3 night stay with no extra towels provided. Reasonable price but never worth it when you lose sleep worrying whether the sheets are really clean. Uncomfortable mattress.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!!! Great Location!!!”
Reviews.Author: Lori A
Reviews.Content: We had a girls weekend in Key West last month and we looked online to find a hotel. We saw the Pegasus International Hotel and it seemed really interesting. We were quoted a rate which was very reasonable and the staff was extremely friendly, we booked two rooms. We were more than impressed when we arrived. The location could not have been better! Absolutely perfect! The rooms were very clean and the property was a lot of fun especially the roof top pool! We had so much fun and would highly recommend the Pegasus Hotel in Key West to anyone traveling there! Thank you so much for an amazing experience!!!

Reviews.Title: “Best Price & Location! Staff A+++”
Reviews.Author: MIKEYD35805
Reviews.Content: I have to agree with the other guests who have stayed here. The Pegasus is dollar for dollar the cleanest and friendliest hotels that I have stayed in, in and along the Keys. My wife & I checked in with no delay, the rooms were nicely kept and newly remodeled. Great location to see all the action. Keep it up Pegasus!!! We will be back soon.

Reviews.Title: “Great location!”
Reviews.Author: Itwasmekb
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in the best location. You walk everywhere and it is in the middle of everything. Comfortable hotel, nice rooms.

Reviews.Title: “good location”
Reviews.Author: darcybrown
Reviews.Content: Good location if you want to be in the middle of beach and the sunset. Shopping, bars and places to eat on both sides. Reasonable priced. Have shuttle to airport, which you are suppose to tell them in advance and I didn't and they had no problem helping me out with that. Deck and pool area was impressed with, and very clean. Good continental breakfast, great coffee. It does have a very small lobby area, but I didn't go there to sit in the lobby. Thank you to your staff for being friendly and helpful. Darcy Brown from North Dakota

Reviews.Title: “Boutique Hotel-Awesome Location”
Reviews.Author: Sunmom46
Reviews.Content: This hotel couldn't be in a better location. Right on Duval Street, just a short walk to Jimmy Buffet's Margaritaville restaurant, and all the fantastic night life of downtown Key West. We booked this hotel for location, unsure of what we would get for the very reasonable price that we paid. The hotel is very retro on the outside, and colorful in the guest rooms. Our room was fairly small (the cheapest price), but just right for us. We are used to European rooms, and this was similar to rooms we have rented in Provence. Colorful, playful and clean. The bathroom was small, but newly re-done. On the second-floor rooftop there was a swimming pool, hot tub and a very nice area for sunning or just sipping coffee in the morning or glass of wine in the evening. A continental breakfast is included. As others have pointed out, what is important in Key West is the location, and this is the best. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the Keys. Friendly staff, clean rooms with breakfast and great location makes The Pegasus International a very desirable hotel. We will be visiting Key West again in a few weeks and hope we will be able to book with Pegasus.

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: mmm088
Reviews.Content: this hotel fits in the area not to fancy, we had an executive room, it was dated ceiling had a big crack in it, room needed work, the windows would not lock, the door was like what you would find in a motel, not sure i would trust the lock on the door handle, the bathroom was clean but the walls needed work and paint, but felt safe in this hotel,since we were on the roof near the pool area, the staff was great, overall because the hotel wasn't to fancy and it blended in the surrounding area we enjoyed our stay, it would be a nice hotel with some fix ups and fresh paint

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: Suzanne B
Reviews.Content: Small quaint hotel right on Duval St. And very quiet. Comfy beds, clean room. A great spot for walking to everything. Nothing fancy, just basic. Small pool and hot tub area on sun deck on 2nd floor. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: Dennisse M
Reviews.Content: This hotel was great!! its kocated in a great place close to everything nice and touristic everything was at walking distance, the room was clean and had good conditioning for the hot weather it also had the necessary equipment for a tourist. Right from the start the check in was quick and easy. I also really enjoyed the pool and the hot tub. I even found the bikes that they rented cheap and convenient especially since nothing is that far and it would be a waste to take a taxi. Overall I found this a very comfortable stay I would recommend it to anyone and will most definitely book it for my next stay at key west.

Reviews.Title: “Great lcoation!”
Reviews.Author: BeenThere1000Xs
Reviews.Content: The remodel of the hotel to a "boutique" style resort fail short. They spent a lot of money in cosmetic work but it is still an old Key West Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “amazing place”
Reviews.Author: krisha v
Reviews.Content: This hotel was nice. Let me start off by saying that I am hard to please when it comes to hotels, I normally will not even stay in a hotel unless it is 4 star. Cleanliness is #1 to me and Im one of those weirdos that must have white bedding. When we checked in it was quick and easy, the lobby is beautiful with chandeliers. We had free wi-fi in the room, and late check out which was nice since most hotels charge for that. The room was emaculate and very clean. The bed was AMAZINGLY comfortable. There was a flat screen television and even a fridge which you sometimes dont find in hotels. We didnt get in the pool, but did walk around the pool area which seems really nice with a tikki bar which I must say has amazing food and drinks. Overall it was a wonderful stay and I hope to go back and actually enjoy the pool

Reviews.Title: “Overall a disappointing stay”
Reviews.Author: SharkyCornwall
Reviews.Content: First the positives Located smack in the centre of Duval Street and walking distance to everything important. Nice art deco styling. Parking available nearby for ten dollars a day. The negatives Small rooms poorly equipped but clean Breakfast very poor in terms of quality and space to eat it in. Most important if you are anything other than a heavy sleeper you will not get sleep here. Duval street really rocks until at least 4am after which the street cleaners go into full swing followed by the cockerels and lorries delivering the next days beer. If you are here to party or are deaf this is the place for you. For those that can hear and want some sleep avoid at all costs

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, close to anywhere!!! coming back for sure!!!”
Reviews.Author: Carla M
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a nice place to spend our vacation in Key West... couldnt have picked better... while others were returning home tired from all the attractions and their hotels were far, our hotel was just in the middle of Duval facing all the bars for the night fun... so we didnt have to worry about coming back using a car or something...also behind the hotel there were beautiful streets and buildings were i loved to walk to relax a bit... there was a nice pool where we spend a lot of time just chillin and drinking from the tiki bar, that was great in the daytime, meanwhile the hot tube in the nightime was a treat.. the style of the hotel and the colors specially of the outside area made it very pleasent just to hang out... loved it, any kind of food in the area... friendly staff very cooperative with our needs, I highly recommend it!! Its nice!

Reviews.Title: “Great Time!”
Reviews.Author: Cheekw08
Reviews.Content: Im a college student who went to key west to have an awesome time and because of the location of this hotel was perfect to help my friends and I do that! Ten seconds from: everything- Bars, Walgreens is next door, shopping, restaraunts, and everything else key west has to offer! Great pool and hot tub with a bar on the rooftop overlooking Duval Street (which is the main street through key west).

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Place in a Great Location”
Reviews.Author: EdEmmerson
Reviews.Content: We came in on the Key West Express from Fort Myers for the weekend. It is walking distance with a backpack. If you have luggage maybe not so much. Easy early check in a few hours ahead of time. We were really just hoping to store our packs. Staff was very friendly and nice. It was a little pricey for the room but one of the few places in that area that excepted one night accommodations. Walking distance to everything on Duval St. from Mallory Sq. to Southernmost Point. We did not take advantage of it because of the air temp (60s) but the pool looked very nice and clean. Very nice lounge area, although not open to purchase anything when I was there, it was still a very nice place to sit and relax or look out over Duval St.

Reviews.Title: “Pegasus International Hotel”
Reviews.Author: TravelingAndy_11
Reviews.Content: We stayed one night and it was a dive compared to any other place we have ever stayed, the room was a two queen configeration and you had to walk sideways to slip past the bed to get into the closet of a bathroom. The toilet had overflowed from a previous guest and there was toilet paper and poop in the corners by the showers edge in the grout, did'nt even want to shower due to the mold in there. The beds were worn out and pulled us to the middle, the carpet was old as well as the furnishings, except for the flat screen TV. The pool and hot tub area was ok except you feel like your in a fish tank with all the rooms able to look down on you, the air conditioning units are a nusince to listen to while your out there to. The plus side to the pool area is being able to look down on Duval from the deck area. If you want location this is the place for that, the parking is close if you have a car and they have a shuttle that will pick you up or drop you off at the airport, this place is in the center of the action though and walking distance to most of the resturants, bars, museums and Mallory Square. If it was'nt for the bathroom I would have rated this average at best.

Reviews.Title: “Love location”
Reviews.Author: eam1417
Reviews.Content: Have stayed at the Pegasus twice a year for the last 4 yrs. Love it, people are great, terrific location and staff are really nice and friendly

Reviews.Title: “New Years Day in Key West”
Reviews.Author: nmradio
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews of the Pegasus International, we decided to give it a go. Had a very comfortable room by the pool and hot tub on the roof. Bed was comfortable and the room was clean. The staff is very friendly and helpful. We rented bikes down the street for $10 for 8 hours, so touring the island was fun and easy. We did pay $10 for the night to park, but it was worth it. Breakfast offerings were basic. Cereal, toast, bagels, muffins, juice and coffee were offered. We skipped it because we wanted a more elaborate meal. We would absolutely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “My 2 favorite places in the world to be!”
Reviews.Author: Donna771
Reviews.Content: My 1st favorite place is Key West and the 2nd most favorite place is the Pegasus. Rooms are clean. The staff is friendly and very accommodating. The parking is close by and is right in the center of Duval street. If you go upon the balcony you can watch the people doing " the Duval Crawl". We are planning a trip soon to the Pegasus. Can't wait!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location for a Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Spiderman-is-back
Reviews.Content: When we planned our trip to Key West, we went to Trip Advisor to check out the Hotels. The Pegasus had some good reviews and it also has that great location. It was also price pretty reasonable. We paid $110 a night, Paid $10 to park, but that was for our entire stay ( 3 Days) After we parked the car, we never did feel the need to use it. The Hotel is located, so just about everything is a short walk. Even Malory Square and those lovely sunsets !! As for the room it self, it was nice. Good size room, Nice T.V. mounted on the Wall, Little Fridge and Microwave inside as well. The fridge came in handy as there is a Wal-Greens right around the corner from the hotel. If we get back to Key West, We'll be staying at The Pegasus for sure !!

Reviews.Title: “Great time!!”
Reviews.Author: Erin F
Reviews.Content: We loved it!! We will be back. Location was perfect. Our room was clean and the service great. Love the pool level. The king size bed was just the way we like them. The staff is very helpful and pleasant. We look forward to our next visit. Go check it out. Our favorite place!!

Reviews.Title: “Key location”
Reviews.Author: govelphoto
Reviews.Content: We arrived at pegasus, and were stoked it was not only on Duval street, but basically right in the middle. We paid a little over two hundred dollars for a nights stay and parking (tax and fees are apparently astronomical, as we were quoted 140 but whatever...). Don't expect much for the rooms, the bed was not comfortable, the bathroom looks like it was redone recently in our room, and they plopped down a huge tv on the dresser (not that you should be in your room ever besides sleeping!). Didn't get much sleep because we had a room facing Duval, maybe try and request another one? Either way, it's worth the location because you don't have to walk far or cab it anywhere to another place

Reviews.Title: “A great place!!!”
Reviews.Author: Burtelle
Reviews.Content: We are so happy that we found the Pegasus International Hotel a few years ago. We have been staying there ever since and always have a great stay. The staff is very accommodating, friendly, and professional. The rates are more than reasonable (especially given the convenient location to everything in Key West). We will continue to stay here whenever we visit!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location”
Reviews.Author: Omar_NYC
Reviews.Content: I'm originally from NYC but living in MIA at the moment. My friends and I decide to take drive to key west and spend the night, Saturday 11-19-11. The rate for one night that we found in Hotels.com for two queen beds, private bathroom, and sofa in the room was $200. The hotel is decent, clean, NOT fancy, and the location was perfect in duval street. Parking cost $10 per night and they have free continental breakfast until 9AM. If you are looking for something semi-affordable, great location and clean this is the place to stay in key west.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and reasonably priced!”
Reviews.Author: GuntownBob
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Pegasus for nine days from the end of October (Fantasy Fest) thru the first week of November, 2011. It is located on Duval Street, in the heart of all the action. We found the Pegasus to be clean and reasonably maintained. It's our understanding that parts of the hotel were recently renovated, including the roof, where there is a swimming pool, hot tub, and a bar. Unfortunately we did not use any of these, but our friends reported that the hot tub was in good condition when they used it. Our hotel room (and especially the bathroom) was smaller than most hotel rooms that we're accustomed to, but it was neat and comfortable. Yes, it had a window air conditioner near the bed, but at the end of each day we were so tired that the sound of it running never interfered with our sleep. Our room attendant did a nice job and was responsive to the few requests that we had. A basic continental breakfast was available every morning, and it included coffee, orange juice, milk, a small selection of cereals, bagels, and large muffins. Positive features: great location; reasonably priced for Key West; neat; very helpful staff; complimentary transportation to and from the airport; the roof is a great place to sunbathe or to sit, relax, and watch the Fantasy Fest Parade. Neutral features: small rooms; minimal counter space in the bathroom; no room safe. Negative features: none. Summary - if you're used to top-of-the-line, "four star" accommodations, than the Pegasus is probably not for you. But if you're seeking a nice, unpretentious place to shower, sleep, and re-charge your batteries, then do consider the Pegasus. Yeah, we wished the room was bigger, but really, why would you be in your room that much anyway? You're in Key West!!! Oh, and one more thing: those of you who have never been to Key West should be aware that it's not an uncommon occurrance to wake-up to the sounds of roosters crowing at sunrise.

Reviews.Title: “Location is Superb”
Reviews.Author: LanaMiami
Reviews.Content: Loved this funky Key West Hotel. Right on Duval. The price was TERRIFIC, the room was newly renovated, Breakfast was OK Parking was close. What my husband & I both really liked, was that it is a non-smoking hotel. The staff is pleasant. Will return

Reviews.Title: “ohohohhh!! GREAT......”
Reviews.Author: Jackie V
Reviews.Content: Nice time with friends...... great place and entertainment around Duval St, enjoyed beaches and hot weather. Staying at Pegasus International was a good idea, very nice, clean hotel. Thanks to all the people they gave us a royal treatment. Will come back soon!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Location great but needs renovations”
Reviews.Author: John8di
Reviews.Content: The hotel website shows a newer version of what the reality of it is. Hotel needs a paint job. Service was good. Rooms were ok for key west but will not return. For the price, not worth it. We had a wall unit AC that was right above our heads in bed that hummed too loud. There was no mirror in the room except for the bathroom which was too small. The TV was 20". Not a very satisfying experience.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience”
Reviews.Author: Gioconda C
Reviews.Content: Great vacation at Key West. Pegasus International had a very nice & professional staff. Great location all the attractions were close we could walk and have fun. My family and I enjoyed the hotel and the beautiful pool

Reviews.Title: “Very Friendly and Very Clean !”
Reviews.Author: JuliaPENZ
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spend 5 nights at the Pegasus Hotel and absolutely loved it . My girlfriend recommended us this hotel and it was a great choice ! The nice young lady from front desk was very friendly and very helpful with directions , where to go and where the best spots to eat. We loved the pool , nit . In our room we found everything we needed , bathroom was spotless , I would love to come back , great job guys!

Reviews.Title: “Excellet location!”
Reviews.Author: Minoakafl
Reviews.Content: This hotel is small but very clean and in an excellent location. The price is also great! And easy parking. There is a small pool and cute bar and lounge area on the 2nd floor roof. I would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Price & Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Doparh
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a few days in KW. Pegasus was a great bang for your buck. Plenty of room in the room for three people, the room was very clean, nice shower, they have a parking lot about 1/2 block from the hotel--drop your stuff off at the door, park your car and you are good to go. Perfect location to walk anywhere you need to go, Mallory Square, marina, restaurants, shopping, it's all just a stones throw away. Will definately be rebooking Pegasus for my next trip.

Reviews.Title: “Very Happy”
Reviews.Author: DINA W
Reviews.Content: For our first trip to the Keys I was very impressed with the hotel. When my husband and I checked in the room was ready for us. The closeness to everything is wonderful and on the day of check out they let us store our luggage till later on when we where leaving, front desk clerk very sweet and helpful. If I go back I will stay at the Pegasus for sure

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location!”
Reviews.Author: FloridaRetired
Reviews.Content: Great location for "Old Town" Key West, right in the heart of everything. Park the car and walked all weekend to all the sites on Duval St, from Mallory Square to the southern most point. Clean and comfortable small room and a great pool deck with bar on the second floor overlooking Duval. The continental breakfast is not worth the effort, but that's not why we came to Key West!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome vacation spot”
Reviews.Author: Mike S
Reviews.Content: This hotel was everything that I could have wanted or expected. The room was clean and the staff was very helpful and courteous. The food was great and the location is good as well. I will use this property for all of my future trips to Key West.

Reviews.Title: “The best kept secret gem of key west!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: jessacya
Reviews.Content: Upon entrace I was greeted with welcoming smiles...right on duval and southard...one block from all the sights in any direction but not as noisy or crowded near great food spots...pubs...transit...beach....music...prime shops...elevator or stairs to my floor...immaculate modern boutique room! Flat screen tv comfy clean gorgeous accommodations, roof top patio plush Miami club feel...view of duval tables w night time campfire centers, lounge chairs/beds for prime tanning and relaxing pool,bar,hot tub, Indian tappas menu ,amazing happy hour! Exclusively catering to hotel guests only...lights in the pool at night...amazing spot favorite on the island by far!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, but unfortunatly no environmental thinking”
Reviews.Author: isomet
Reviews.Content: We saw the excellent reviews on TripAdvisor and decided to come to this hotel. Good rates for good rooms with everything you would expect, with a nice pool and everything. They have a designated parking lot on the next block, so parking won't be any problems even though it is located in the middle of Duval Street. The location is just superb. It is right at the heart of the Key West action on the corner of Southard/Duval, with everything within walking distance, such as bars, restaurants, beaches and the Hemingway house. Even though the hotel is situated in the middle of the action, we couldn't hear a thing into our room, which was located on the top floor towards the street. We slept like logs every night. There was only one drawback, which should matter for every person that cares about our planet and its resources. The hotel lacks any kind of environmental thinking. There was no option for you to reuse your towels, which is pretty much de facto standard these days. Everything used for the breakfast table was also made out of styrofoam plastic, with no option to recycle, everything went just straight down the bin. Since styrofoam can be lethal to birds or sea creatures that swallows significant quantities, the hotel management staff should really work for getting an acceptable environmental option in place. If the breakfast was better, and they would consider the environment at all, I would gladly have rated this hotel a 5.

Reviews.Title: “A very pleasant surprise”
Reviews.Author: Keys66
Reviews.Content: Right in the middle of everything. Clean. Great staff. Spa and bar were unexpected bonuses. Narrow stairwells were a classic charm. Can be a bit noisy for those wanting to go sleep early (it is on the Corner of Duval St)

Reviews.Title: “Right in the heart of Key West!”
Reviews.Author: Linda F
Reviews.Content: This art deco hotel is located right in the middle of all the action that Key West has to offer!!! We loved walking to all of the wonderful boutiques and nightclubs! This hotel offers an authentic taste of Key West! We will definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: mlightfine
Reviews.Content: We almost always stay at Pegasus. The location is great, We love the pool and hot tub on the second floor and the hotel is very close to everything we want to do. PLUS the staff at the hotel treat us like royalty... Every year we find more amenities to make it even better... Thanks Pegasus we will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location!”
Reviews.Author: lemon737
Reviews.Content: You can't beat this location if you just want to be exposed to the old Key West charm. Most of the chain hotels are on the other side of the island, when you are just crossing over onto Key West. If you want to drink on Duval Street (which is where you should be if your going to Key West) you will have to drive or take a cab back to the other hotels. Pegasus is right in the middle of Duval Street! Stay in downtown Key West for the best trip. Very clean and art deco hotel. Great price!

Reviews.Title: “Pegasus we love it and we will be back”
Reviews.Author: fran68_10
Reviews.Content: Another awesome vacation me and my husband have been going to Key West for 10 years now and we stayed at different hotels but we have been staying at the Pegasus for the past 5 years we go 3 times a year and we love our stay at the Pegasus. They treat us like family. I would recommend Pegasus to everyone its another great experience thanks again.... we will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Good Location but stay out of the pool!”
Reviews.Author: timob54
Reviews.Content: The location of the hotel is great. Older hotel but rooms were clean. Had 2 rooms and both locks were very loose. Called and these were fixed. Pool was very dirty. I asked last time pool was cleaned and was told by desk clerk it's cleaned at least once a month. Pool area nice but everything was closed during our visit.

Reviews.Title: “we loved it and we will be back”
Reviews.Author: dan c
Reviews.Content: the service was great and the people were awsome couldnt ask for a better location in down town key west

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel despite rude receptionists”
Reviews.Author: Ed B
Reviews.Content: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay here, but my girlfriend had to tell the receptionist that she didn't need to get angry within 3 minutes of checking in! They continued to be surly and unhelpful for the duration, but other than that the bar/pool area is great, location fantastic, and rooms decent. Only additional disappointment is that the free car parking now costs $10 per day, as does the free shuttle to the airport (per person). There is still free internet though...

Reviews.Title: “It's a great value, if you take the good with the bad”
Reviews.Author: Rebecca B
Reviews.Content: You can only get one key per room, no connecting rooms, 4 person max on elevator, parking is down the street, they leave the outside doors open so the hallways are very hot, the a/c was not on in the room, so it took a while for the room to cool off in August, skip the continental breakfast (coffee was like tar and no milk for cereal).... With the bad out of the way, the overall stay was nice for the price. It is located right on Duvall!!! The rooms were clean!

Reviews.Title: “PLEASANTLY SURPRISED!!”
Reviews.Author: Mary P
Reviews.Content: We live in Ft. Lauderdale and don't make the 4 hour drive as much as we should. We were slightly concerned about staying at an "older" hotel (since we've seen how horrible some of the "older" ones on Ft. Lauderdale Beach are) but this place is GREAT!! We drove down as a 9th birthday trip for our daughter and we also had our 13 year old daughter with us. Our room was very clean and spacious. The pool was literally about 20 steps from our door which was GREAT! The location was also great - right there in the middle of everything but the room was quiet at night. The parking was handy enough and since we didn't move our car the entire stay it was perfect! The staff was CONSTANTLY cleaning which was also nice to see. I did a lot of research on the internet before booking our stay and it sure paid off! Now that we found this awesome place to stay we will be back more often!!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Location!”
Reviews.Author: 2ENVYus
Reviews.Content: This was our first time in Key West and what better way to start it all off was the location of this hotel. Parking was an issue in order to check in as they do not have a driveway at the entrance to the hotel. We managed to park in a Public Parking area, walk to the hotel and from there given a place to park in a lot a very short distance way from the hotel. The room was modest & somewhat small. However, we did not plan to spend a lot of time in the room. It did have have a small microwave & frig. The rooftop patio was very nice to catch some sun with a pool & hot tub. There's also a small bar up there to enjoy a cold beer. A blessing was the Walgreen's right next door that has everything - water, sodas, snacks & anything else you might need. The location of this hotel makes it stand head & shoulders above the rest for the price of the room!! You can always end your night at Mr. Z's just outside the hotel entrance for a late-night cheese steak sub & a slice of pizza. We will be back to the Pegasus for our next visit to the Keys!!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and Location”
Reviews.Author: BillD302
Reviews.Content: Flew in on Cape Air and Marco From Pegasus Hotel was waiting for us to bring to their hotel. Checked in by Swetlana who was very nice and knowable about the area. Room was clean and very comfortable. This hotel is right in the middle of Duval streeet, where everything is. Asked Swetlana many times on things to do and she was always very helpful and friendly. First time at this hotel and this will be the only hotel on future vacations to Key West. Back to the airport and Marco was there on time to make sure the stay was perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay, Great service, Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: Bulldogger1
Reviews.Content: We took the Key West Express to Key West and was greeted at the terminal by Marcos, from Pegasus. He was extremely helpful getting us around the island anytime we asked. Olga gave us a wonderful reception at the hotel. She was awesome!!! This girl was friendly and did everything possible to make our stay the best it could be. Give this young lady a raise! Overall very satisfied with our stay and will return.

Reviews.Title: “Great spot on Duval”
Reviews.Author: Ardy12
Reviews.Content: While management may not be the most friendly people, the hotel is well located on Duval Street and relatively modern. Our two rooms had two queen beds and 1 single each and being adjacent to the rooftop pool made it ideal for hanging out. The rooms were spacious with updated bathrooms - a bit on the small side - but adequate. Parking is free and very close to the hotel. Definitely recommend for a group of friends or couples.

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel right on Duval Street”
Reviews.Author: C50Wiz
Reviews.Content: Booking at an older and smaller hotel seemed like a crapshoot, but the property is very nice, clean, and modern amenities like the bathrooms and large flat screen TV were a great surprise. This hotel is on the same block of Duval St as Margaritaville and Willie T's and only another block or two gets you to Sloppy Joe's, Hogs Breath, etc. Staying right in the old town instead of a corporate hotel on the other side of the island was great. I'll book here again.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect spot to stay, we loved it!”
Reviews.Author: asingh1
Reviews.Content: Perfect place to walk to shops and resturants--Very cool roof top pool!

Reviews.Title: “good vacations in a good hotel”
Reviews.Author: ingrid_v92
Reviews.Content: We couldnt have found a better place to stay, exelent location and service, close to all the entertainments, we all really have a great time, we highly recommend this hotel, clean rooms, great pool and jacuzzi....!! Great hotel!!!

Reviews.Title: “great trip at pegasus”
Reviews.Author: Maybo2703
Reviews.Content: Pegasus hotel was just perfect, it was the compliment of Key West beauty, Great location, close to everything, bars, restaurants... The rooms were really confortable, service was exellent and the pool and jacuzzi really enjoyable. Certanly going back to Pegasus Hotel!!!

Reviews.Title: “great little hotel”
Reviews.Author: stanleb
Reviews.Content: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Pegasus. I don't think we could have found a better place for exploring Key West. We were within walking distance of everything we wanted to see. The one minor problem we had with the hotel was immediately taken care of by staff. If we return to Key west we will certainly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “faboulous key west!!!”
Reviews.Author: eltato34
Reviews.Content: key west its great!! and was better with our stying in pegasus hotels...exellent location!!! exelent treatment...the jacuzzi and pool were greats...people...if u go to key west you must go to pegasus!!!

Reviews.Title: “excellent place to have fun and great location”
Reviews.Author: pablo1987talleres
Reviews.Content: if you are looking for a great place to have fun and meet new friends, you should definitly try this hotel. just a few blocks from sloopy joes, ricks, and all the famous bars in key west. great acomodations and really clean rooms. u should try it!

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous!”
Reviews.Author: bmr0609
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel due to it's location on Duval and were not disappointed. Our room was nice and obviously recently painted and crown molded in colors classic of Key West. Our bed was comfortable and inviting. The newly renovated bathroom we had was very nice, roomy, and friends who came by were impressed. We enjoyed a 32, maybe 40 inch plasma TV. We had a short stay, but managed to make use of the pool, hot tub, and sundeck with bar for a short time and enjoyed the Caribbean music atmosphere and service. The view and people watching from the roof deck can't be beat. If you are looking for a hot breakfast, look elsewhere, but definitely stay here for the night. We plan to stay in this hotel for many Key West adventures. I'm disappointed that some other reviews are not doing this place the true justice it deserves.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: jenniferrod
Reviews.Content: The Pegasus Hotel has an excellent location with great bars and restaurants a few minutes away. The family room we stayed in was very spacious and clean. Also the staff were very friendly and helpful. I will certainly be returning to this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Best Location and Value in Key West”
Reviews.Author: davidkingmichigan
Reviews.Content: The Pegasus Hotel is in a great location on the center of Duval Street. The hotel is within walking distance to shopping, beaches, restaurants, and bars. The hotel has newly remodeled rooms and bathrooms.I have stayed here many times a year over the past ten years and it is by far the best place to stay in Key West. Looking foward to staying at The Pegasus on my next trip to Key West.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful place”
Reviews.Author: vio010
Reviews.Content: i stay with my friends 3 nights in this hotel,we feel very good here the room are very clean, in a word perfect,the staff are very helpful,we have a nice stay.we will return.in this hotel we like it a lot

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, Reasonably Priced Hotel with Great Location”
Reviews.Author: daqno56968
Reviews.Content: Great location to walk around and visit old Key West. Close to bars and restaurants. Hotel personnel were helpful and friendly. Nice and well kept pool and hot tub areas. Comfortable and clean rooms. Lobby computer for email, copies, and fax

Reviews.Title: “Sweet place to stay !”
Reviews.Author: Elliott088
Reviews.Content: Its got it all, and great location !We enjoyed everything from the breakfast to the brand new king beds. You wont be let down

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place to stay in Key West”
Reviews.Author: leighyoung
Reviews.Content: They had clean rooms and great rates!! It was nice and relaxing, greats of the area and I was so excited to see how close it was to Duval street.

Reviews.Title: “Great Spot on duval”
Reviews.Author: gokou41684
Reviews.Content: I went to Key West with my wife for a little getaway. This place was great. Right on Duval but away from the noise of the most bars. It was perfect.

Reviews.Title: “very nice!!! great location!!!”
Reviews.Author: stolf
Reviews.Content: very nice and clean!!! 5 stars!!! kudos!!! you will love the location and cleanliness!! staff was great!! short distance from beach and town!!

Reviews.Title: “WOW!”
Reviews.Author: lspanjer
Reviews.Content: This hotel is perfect for a nice relaxing getaway! It's at a perfect location, on Duval Street, where all the night life action occurs! It is also within walking distance from Mallory Square! I loved every minute of my stay! I was able to get around town from this location. I needed not worry about taxis or other forms of transportation. The hotel was very clean and the service was excellent! The staff served every need I had!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: russka75
Reviews.Content: Great location, small but very cozy hotel. And the service is excellent especially the night shift.

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: hmancera
Reviews.Content: close to duval street. clean rooms. nice place to stay for the money

Reviews.Title: “What a great time!”
Reviews.Author: keywest42
Reviews.Content: What a great place to stay! Location is great if you want to enjoy the night life. Rooms were clean and the staff was very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Best experiece you will ever have great rates friendly staff convient location AAAA++++++++”
Reviews.Author: fran68_10
Reviews.Content: The Best experience you will ever have best value great rates, friendly staff, convenient location, parking lot, free continental breakfast close to everything no car required pool \spa, I rate the Pegasus AAAA++++++++ I recommend this hotel to all my friends and family I am always satisfied at the Pegasus and will always return thank you for making my vacation a wonderful experience.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT!”
Reviews.Author: gators42
Reviews.Content: Location was awesome! Rooms were clean. Had a great time.

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Kristy95
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for the perfect place to stay......this is it!!! Can't say enough about the location-you're so close to everything. The room was clean & spacious. The staff was GREAT. Will definitely stay here every time we come down to The Keys :) Perfect vacation

Reviews.Title: “The Best hotel in key west”
Reviews.Author: jbrentlyons
Reviews.Content: I've been to key west many times and this place is hands down the cleanest roomiest hotel. The location is in the middle of everything. I will not stay in another hotel in key west but this one.

Reviews.Title: “The spot to be”
Reviews.Author: fywys
Reviews.Content: If you going to key west that is the best hotel to be in.I have been in number of hotels that is the best of all .nice ,clean,best value.

Reviews.Title: “enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: WhatIsMyScreenName
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed staying at this hotel. The location is perfect, right on Duval St. and within walking distance of everything. Our room was quiet, the roof pool clean, staff helpful when asked, parking almost next door.

Reviews.Title: “The best place to stay in Key West”
Reviews.Author: ronnyoninn
Reviews.Content: We went to Key west and got an amazing hotel! we couldn't believe how great the location was, the room was really really clean, which I was surprised about because of how affordable it was. The location was perfect, walkable to everything, right on Duval street. The management was so professional and cool. I saw the manager there resolve a conflict with some people down the hallway, this guy should work in our state department because he was that good and resolving the problem. Thanks for making our accomidations in Key west much more than we expected. We will definitely stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome stay and amazing service”
Reviews.Author: TrifectaConstruction
Reviews.Content: Having to actually do work when going to Key West is never a good time. The Pegasus really gave us the feeling of vacation when we came back from the job site at the end of the day. Very nice and helpful staff just added to the great location and great stay!

Reviews.Title: “key west gem”
Reviews.Author: foreveryoungkw
Reviews.Content: great lacation, if you want to live and feel duval street. rooms were good and clean. a pool on the roof to relax and get some key west sun. nice and helpfull staff that gave us good tips of what to do. very recomended.

Reviews.Title: “Very convinient, clean, and polite/helpful staff here!”
Reviews.Author: MonikTorres
Reviews.Content: Hi everyone! From San Francisco, CA we decided, my boyfriend and I, having a vacation in key west for 7 days and were very worried about finding a not too expensive not cheap, nice, clean and convinient hotel!! A friend of mine, mention the "Pegasus International Hotel" and told us he had a great time in Key West and HIGHLY recommended this hotel. When the time of booking were to stay, we had in our list the Pegasus Hotel, but decided to check and see what was around. We chose the Pegasus hotel and stayed there for 7 days. When arriving the people there were very helpful and polite. Everyone was very nice and friendly. When we got to the room it was very clean, and the nice smell of the room let us know how clean it was, we were very happy with our decision. The pool was wonderful and clean, but we didnt spend so much time on it because we wanted to go to the beach. But observing very closely to the hotel it looked very nice, the decoration and everything was perfect, very clean The location was also convenient since everything was very close to it. Downstairs we ate in a pizzeria where I falled in love with the philly cheese stake!!! It is very juicy and fresh!!!!! love it!!! We HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PLACE!! it is very clean, the location is convenient, and the service is five stars!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Best kept secret!”
Reviews.Author: Kwviren
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Pegasus in February with my husband and we had a very comfortable stay. This is a beautiful stylish hotel and friendly staff. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Key West”
Reviews.Author: itsmark
Reviews.Content: We recently visited Key West florida with my two kids. We stayed at the Pegasus Hotel in Downtow Key West. The hotel is a botique hotel with all the modern amenities. The hotel is clean, bright, fresh and well appointed. The rooms are spacious, updated and clean. They have a heated pool on the roof a quaint bar beside the pool. The location is in the heart of Keywest on Duval Street where the action is. Try it you'll like it!

Reviews.Title: “Great location if you want to be in the middle of Duval”
Reviews.Author: per4mance
Reviews.Content: I've been to Key West several times and where you stay can really impact your experience. This place is perfect if you want to be right on Duval and walk to the shops and bars. You have a Walgreens and pizza place basically in the lobby. We had the corner room right overlooking Duval so great people watching. However, after a late night out prepare to hear roosters, scooter horns and all sorts of truck traffic starting early in the morning. The place had a large deck that overlooked the street and a nice pool and hot tub. They played music all day/night too and had a small bar which had $2.50 Coronas during happy hour! Our room had a microwave, mini fridge, flat screen TV and very updated modern bathroom. Downside: the bathroom door wouldn't shut and if you tried you were stuck in! Overall I would absolutely stay again if I was there for the Duval action.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel. good location.”
Reviews.Author: choz02
Reviews.Content: Is it the ritz? No. For a weekend trip it with friends it was good. We had room 204 which had a great big flat screen tv. Room was clean and staff was friendly. Nice pool for after a day of being out on the ocean. They offer a breakfast of a few muffins and some cereal and coffee on a little stand in the lobby. I thought it was strange that if you wanted another towel you had to give them a towel back. What i liked was that it was close to the action but not to close that at night you heard screaming and yelling from out side. They charge you $10.00 to park for the weekend and not a minute over they check out time. Or you are towed. Parking lot is right down the street from the hotel. I would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “The right location at the right price”
Reviews.Author: knowadeal
Reviews.Content: I have had the pleasure of staying at the Pegasus many times over several years. The (apparently) family owned hotel is a clean, well run, relaxing accomadation in the heart of Key West (old town). I am guessing built in the '30s and is similiar to the "art deco" hotels of S. Beach. Located just off Duval, midway between the touristry N. end and the Southernmost Point, and easily walking distance to anything and everything. While the rooms are not huge(who goes to K.W. to sit in a room?) they are quite well stocked with the amenities. There are micowaves and fridges, quiet, cool a.c.s, working tvs , etc.. In the rare instances where there was an issue, ie. low batteries in the remote, the problems were handled quickly and with a smile from by the friendly, effeceint staff. The majority of times I have stayed has been on business, the free wifi works everywhere, even on the deck(more later) and anything I have ever needed , fax, copies, etc. is available. The deck. Fantastic. Offering an unparralled view of folks doing the "Duval crawl" as well as a rooftop heated pool and spa. A perfect place to enjoy a happy hour or evening cocktail or morning coffee, or both. Shaded tables or lounges for catching a tan or a nap. A few steps out the door down to Duval and you are in the thick of it. I guess you can stay closer to the "action" but at the price, why would you. The Pegasus is a well kept secret (oops).

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: Savvaki87
Reviews.Content: Seems like a all well rounded place. Staff was friendly and hotel was clean for a perfect short weekend getaway!

Reviews.Title: “great place in key west loved it”
Reviews.Author: NicoleandKyle
Reviews.Content: This hotel is close to everything. Staff was very helpful. Everything was very clean and neat. Outside spa is great. Check in was smooth and easy. Check out was the same. We also enjoyed the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, great place to say in Key West”
Reviews.Author: bdezsi
Reviews.Content: Spent the weekend in Key West with friends and found the Pegasus was a excellent place to stay. Rooms were clean and recently remodeled, location was within walking distance to stores, clubs and attractions of Key West. Park the car and leave it! I recommend to Pegasus and I will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Well Worth the price, I would stay again.”
Reviews.Author: adayholliday
Reviews.Content: I was recently invited on a trip with a company out of Detroit Mi. NuWay Construction. We were informed that our time in Key West we would be accommodated by the Pegasus International Hotel. Upon our arrival we were greeted and assigned rooms by a very friendly and professional staff. Having stayed in Key West before I was a little apprehensive about checking into my room but discovered all my expectations were to be proven wrong. The rooms were very clean and the bathrooms had previously been updated and remodeled. The outside of the hotel had a very clean pool and Jacuzzi area. There was even a poolside bar .For the price it was perfect. The Hotel property was centrally located on Duvall St. which made a three day trip easy and enjoyable. You can bring the family or just friends. Keep up the good work Pegasus

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: adecrow
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Pegasus International Hotel for a weekend getaway with some of my friends and the experience was nothing less than fabulous. First and foremost the location of the Pegasus is ideal, being right on Duval St. and within walking to distance to all of the must see attractions of Key West including dining, shopping, and nightlife. The rooftop pool was the perfect way to spend a relaxing day away from the hustle and bustle of the beach. I was more than satisfied with the room, it was very clean and aesthetically decorated, and the room rates were considerably more reasonable than other hotels on Duval. The staff was friendly and accommodating. The Pegasus offered everything I was looking for in a hotel and more.

Reviews.Title: “very clean hotel, awesome location, offstreet parking, and helpfull staff”
Reviews.Author: rackem6969
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this hotel to all my friends and family we came to key west to get away and thats what we did. duval st was alot of fun and we could always find something to do. next time we come to key west we will definitely stay at the pegasus.

Reviews.Title: “This is a charming hotel ideally located”
Reviews.Author: Jan67St_Augustine
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Pegasus over the Thanksgiving holiday and it was excellent. The rooms were clean, well equiped, and nicely decorated. The location was excellent and even included free parking which is signifcant in Key West. Our stay was so enjoyable that we are going back again this week. We enjoyed being able to look out our window and observe the activity on Duval Street. It was also great to be able to walk to countless restaurants, bars and activities. As they say, "it's location, location, location."

Reviews.Title: “Great location-great value-the flavor of Key West in a nutshell!”
Reviews.Author: Abram1234
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were greeted warmly and courteously on our arrival. Our room was very clean and comfortable. What a great value! We found ourselves in the very heart of Old Key West.....walking distance to shops, restaurants, nightlife, attractions, the Atlantic and the Gulf only a short walk away. I would not hesitate to recommend the Pegasus International Hotel to anyone looking for a great reasonably priced place to stay in Key West.

Reviews.Title: “Best Value and Location in Key West.”
Reviews.Author: lmd1660
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at the Pegasus Hotel for years. We love the location on Duval Street. It is in walking distance to shopping, restaurants, and bars. They have newly remodeled rooms with remodeled bathrooms. Very clean. We like having a refridgerater and microwave in the room. We enjoyed the new bar/lounge they added on the pool deck and the continental breakfast they now have in the lobby. They were very accomodating. Had a relaxing vacation, thanks to the Pegasus Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Have been and will come back every year!!”
Reviews.Author: michiganjulie00
Reviews.Content: This hotel gets better and better. Not only is this a fantastic location right on Duval, but the staff/customer service is always top notch welcoming and friendly. The recently renovated rooms are beautiful, clean and comfortable. Pool and deck are the perfect size. Great hotel for all. Been staying here every year for 7 years and they make you feel like family. Will come back every year!

Reviews.Title: “Love this Hotel! Nathan Sailors”
Reviews.Author: nater420
Reviews.Content: great place to stay! right in the middle of duval st. on corner of southard! new pool! I will always go back! great prices and people!

Reviews.Title: “Location is everything”
Reviews.Author: Beetlejeuse
Reviews.Content: It is located in the heart of the action on Duval Street. Since parking is almost non-existent downtown, the parking lot alone is worth the price of the hotel. I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “fun in the sun!!!”
Reviews.Author: bassprotim
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at The Pegasus Hotel several times over the past 5-6 years, and we look forward to our visit once or twice per year. We have always been very, very pleased with our accommodations and have come to find that it is the best place to stay on Key West. The staff are extremely helpful, and the rooms and amenities are great. It goes without saying that the locationâ€”just a few steps off of Duval street--simply cannot be beat! Our room is always immaculate, and the recently remodeled bathroom was very clean and spacious. The television was also brand newâ€”as was the futon mattress, where a third guest sleptâ€¦it was said that the futon rivaled the comfort of either of the other two beds in the suite. The pool deck on the second-level is absolutely perfectâ€”an oasis on key West, and the gem of the hotel. Whether sunning or swimming, it is a great place to relax and meet new friends. Having stayed at 3-4 different properties on Kew West over the years, we have gone back to The Pegasus nearly 10 times nowâ€”and have also sent friends to stay here. The review have never changed: The Pegasus Hotel is a great place to stay when visiting Key West!

Reviews.Title: “small but nice hotel, amazing location”
Reviews.Author: Kerri2496
Reviews.Content: We stayed 4 days ~ it was our honeymoon plus there was a group we traveled with. We all stayed at the Pegasus. It was great. The lobby is tiny, but there is a desk to check in at then you head up to your room. We were on the 2nd floor, right near the stairs and the pool. Most importantly the Pegasus Hotel is located on Duval St. right in the middle of everything, so you literally walk out the door into all the action =) Which was perfect for us. During the day we'd get up and walk all around the island, at night we'd hit the bars with friends & enjoy the nightlife and not have to worry about a taxi or driving. This was the best vacation I've had yet & can't wait to visit Key West again, I would def. recommend the Pegasus Hotel & hope to stay there again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: terry308
Reviews.Content: This is a very clean hotel, great location, staff very helpful. They accomodate any request.Definitely recommend this to anyone who travels to Key West & wants to be in the center of everything. Can't wait to go back!!

Reviews.Title: “A+ hospitality”
Reviews.Author: cheryl748
Reviews.Content: we spent a fantastic time at the pegasus! we're reap travelers to key west, and have spent are time in other hotels, but we keep coming back! you can't beat the location,convenience,or hospitality anywhere! thank you pegasus, cheryl and carrie from melbourne, florida.

Reviews.Title: “Our Fifth Great Stay At This Place ... Be Back For A Sixth!”
Reviews.Author: Wildwoodgirl74
Reviews.Content: This was our fifth vacation stay at this hotel, and each year the place gets better and better! No ... it's not very fancy, and the bathrooms are a little cramped, but what it is, is quite clean, with a pleasant and accommodating staff, free Continental breakfast, a guest parking lot, free in-room Internet, frig, microwave, an outdoor pool, and most important, it is outstandingly well located right on famous Duval Street and next door to a 24/7 Walgreen's, This is a European style tourist hotel, with a fun kick. And the price we paid was very reasonable, allowing us to enjoy more of Key West's attractions. We will return for our sixth year, and recommend this establishment for a economical, clean, safe and perfectly located place to stay in old Key West.

Reviews.Title: “Best location in Key West”
Reviews.Author: davidkingmichigan
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in several hotels over the past few years. I have found that The Pegasus has the the best location on the center of Duvall St, close to where all the action is. The Pegasus rates are very resonable in comparison to other hotels in the area. The Pegasus has always been a nice hotel, but everytime I visit, the Pegasus is continually upgrading the hotel. There are many new amenitys every time I visit the hotel. I look forward to staying at The Pegasus on my next visit to Key West.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and Value”
Reviews.Author: STJMinnesota
Reviews.Content: The location can not be beat for all attractions in Key West. You have everything you need with in steps of your room... and the biggest bonus is Mr Z's subs right next door. The roof top deck is great to chill and people watch. You can't beat the rate and the staff is great.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location, Big rooms”
Reviews.Author: nicolebzh
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Pegasus International for a couple days and it was great. They just redid the bathrooms and the carpeting. It has a small sundeck with a pool and hottub (overlooking Duval Street). The location is perfect to explore Key West and staff can recommend closeby shops / scooter rentals. The room was very clean and has WiFi, TV and even a small fridge and a microwave.

Reviews.Title: “Best Location”
Reviews.Author: danielbon
Reviews.Content: We've stayed for a few nights at this hotel and really enjoyed our time. The hotel is right at Duval Street and almost everything is in walking distance. The hotel was very clean and confortable. There is a pool and a heated whirlpool. We really enjoyed our stay, there is nothing we can complain about it.

Reviews.Title: “Bueno, Bonito & Barato”
Reviews.Author: miaminn
Reviews.Content: In Spanish - Great, Pretty and Inexpensive. We've stayed here a few times and absolutely love it. The location could not get any better - it's right on Duval just a little ways from all the fun, the pool area is very nice and relaxing, rooms are nice size for the tenure of the hotel and the bathrooms have recently been redone and look very nice. Would highly recommend it. We are getting married in KW in March and have recommended it to all our friends! No restaurant but there's a great little place called Z's that is open til' 4am and has great subs & pizza.

Reviews.Title: “Location is Everything”
Reviews.Author: eam1417
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Pegasus the past 3 times we have been to Key West and the staff has been very helpful and lots off fun to be around to be around. We have never had any problems with this Hoel and it is a perfect location for a handicap person to stay in. You are in the heart of everything, and how much time do you really spend in your room in Key West. We are getting ready to make our reservations again for this October.

Reviews.Title: “great location, skip breakfast”
Reviews.Author: FLGene
Reviews.Content: The biggest asset of this hotel is it's location. It's right on Duval St, right in the thick of things. Another big plus of this hotel is it's roof top pool. There is plenty of deck space to lay out and get some sun and it was a pleasant surprise to see a pool right in downtown, considering this isn't one of the big name hotels. Getting a room at this place also includes a continental breakfast. I'm not exactly sure what time they put all the food out, but we came down at around 9 and the milk they had out for cereal was warm and tasted as it was on the brink of going spoiled. I was also a litlle disappointed to see that they only had instant coffee, considering it doesn't take much (time or money) to brew a pot of coffee. Another negative is that once you get your breakfast, they don't really have anywhere to sit, so we ended up bringing our food back to our room. Parking is available, however it is down the street, but it's less than a 5 minute walk away. To sum it up,clean rooms, great location and pool, but go out for breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “best location in paradise”
Reviews.Author: davidkingmichigan
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Pegasus Hotel for a number of years and I have only good things to say about it. What first drew me to this hotel was the location directly on the center section of Duval(at southard). I always call in advance of booking my reservation and I find the staff very receptive. I even request specific rooms since i have been staying here so frequently. Every time I come here(over the years) I notice that there have been many improvements like a complimentary breakfast bar and the rooms were re-painted and crown moulding added and numerous other improvements throughout the hotel. the rooms are always well kept and clean. They also now provide transportation from the airport, which i have used. When i drive down it is convenient to have parking as well here at this hotel. I find the rates very resonable compared to the other hotels in the area. This hotel has the best location, rates and amenities. I have read a few reviews that weren't good and can't believe that these people were staying at the same hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Not bad, but wouldn't come back”
Reviews.Author: Tatianochka
Reviews.Content: The room was quite spacious and the bed was huge, but there was some strange smell in the room which was hard to get over. The shower is very very small, the restroom itself is tiny and not so attractive and clean. Our room was overlooking the street and it was super noisy, I was waking up all the time. The hallways are very hot, there is no AC, so be ready to sweat on the way to your room. Inside the room the temperature is fine though. Didn't check out the breakfast, but looks like they do serve it, and by the way, they have jakuzzi too. Upon the check out the front desk girl wouldn't give us 100 $ deposit back, if we didn't remind her to. In a nutshell, not bad, but go there only if you are short of money and don't have other choices. I wouldn't come back...

Reviews.Title: “Just right for us”
Reviews.Author: leisurefreinds
Reviews.Content: Some people will have a good experience and odds are that there will be a bad experience somewhere. Do your research. We wanted a good location for walking around Duval St.and convenient sight seeing. This hotel meets the criteria. Certainly the rooms are basic, the bathrooms are small-- are you in your room or sightseeing Key West! If you want big rooms big bathrooms, room service, breakfast, and all the amenities then stay at the pricy big hotels. This one we will return to-- it was comforatable. If you stay there, sit on the roof deck and watch the evening street activities. The pool side rooms are a bit quieter but street side was not bothersome! Our desk service was very pleaseant and helpful!

Reviews.Title: “Great place!”
Reviews.Author: lilangel86
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay,depending on a purpuse of your trip,i was there with my boyfriend and we needed a hotel just to spend a night and take a shower!cause we spend all days out on a beach,shopping and going out to the bars and clubs,this basicly why most of a people going to KW,but if you go there to spend weekend in a hotel,you should go somewhere else,but dont forget,the other places in downtown area will charge you MUCH MORE per night!!!Rooms were clean,and staff was friendly,i work in a customer service and i know how hard its some times with customers,especialy with those who put themselfs over other people,hate it... P.S. dont trust everything people write in a reviews!!! I didnt and dont regret about my choice of pegasus hotel!!!

Reviews.Title: “Avoid......over priced, outdated, RUDE, RUDE staff. Not worth $200 a night.”
Reviews.Author: BJH6963
Reviews.Content: Feel as though taken advantage of on price. Booked room earlier and checked in late to avoid driving after a few drinks. Called front desk for shampoo........told no room service. After arguing someone brought shampoo to door, knocked on it and left quickly. Front staff at check in only grunted when we entered. AVOID, AVOID, AVOID

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the money, crappy”
Reviews.Author: koley0724
Reviews.Content: we arrived on a tuesday and when we got there they were working on the deck areound the pool. we went out on to the where the pool is and there was shattered glass all over. when we got in the hot tub it was cold and had glass in it. the screens on windows looked like they were jimmed open. the room did not look like the picture of the room we thought we were gonna get. It was not worth the money that we paid. very upset, they shut the breakfast down early so we did not get to eat. They said they had free internet and when we got there they said there was 20cents per min charge so we were not able to use our computer.

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location combined with great price”
Reviews.Author: speederinred
Reviews.Content: After i read the reviews i was hesitant to stay but boy am i glad i did. The reviews i read spoke to rude staff and unclean rooms. I was there for Christmas vacation and i could not have asked for anything more for the price. this hotel was right on Duval street just blocks to anything you would want to do! Food, entertainment, water activities were all very close in walking distance. While other hotels were at least 100 dollars more, some more than that, i was thrilled to get the rate i did on Duval street. When you go to the keys, you don't stay in your room, all the attraction is outside!!! While the room was standard with no extra ammenities, it did have a refrigerator and microwave with a small table and chairs. I will stay here again without hesitation!! And as far as the staff being rude, they were nothing but nice to me. Maybe the people that wrote the reviews were not so friendly themselves!! The room was clean, and the location was superb!!!!

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: tal28
Reviews.Content: best place to stay in key west.nice rooms.best location ,you can live your car parked,right in the center of town.

Reviews.Title: “Nice economical stay in a great part of town”
Reviews.Author: kharmannghia
Reviews.Content: We found the hotel to be a fun place to stay that was within walking distance of all the popular attractions of Key West. The staff was friendly and helpful. The TV in the room wouldn't power on and I went to the front desk to notify them and 15 minutes later a member of the staff was knocking on our door to fix the problem, which he did. Its an older hotel but we had a great room with a view of Duval St. and the sun deck area of the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Location is all you get”
Reviews.Author: BH7832
Reviews.Content: Stayed here years back with a buddy and got a room just off the pool with a window overlooking Southard. Location just a short walk from all the action of Duval is fantastic. Even has a pool, a hot tub and a view of Duval from the deck. Decided to stay again when I needed a room for one night before my wife arrived in town, with that same buddy and his wife (we were both single back the first time). This time, I got Room 200. Holy Cow is that one loud room. It sits on the corner of Duval and Southard. The up lights that show off the hotel point directly into the room. Taking a nap at 9pm on a Thursday was impossible. Besides the location, if you want to party, there is nothing good about this hotel. The rooms are dark, with paper thin walls. The bathroom is the smallest I have ever seen. The TV was old (remote had lost the battery cover). You have to pay a $10 deposit on the key because they apparently only have one key for each room. No credit card style keys here. I gave the value 3 because it was only $99 in March. Overall, probably okay for Spring Breakers who will be out until all hours anyway and want the location and price, but for anybody else, stay away.

Reviews.Title: “"EVERYONE IS RIGHT ABOUT THIS PLACE"”
Reviews.Author: cindo11
Reviews.Content: I couldn't agree more with most of these reviews.I asked for non-smoking room,didn't get it. In my room there was an ashtray filled with cigarettes! THE woman at the front desk is rude to say the least!The pool is not heated ,as they say..The worst was the bugs,though..UNBELIEVABLE!! I woke up to find them in and all over my purse. They looked like mites.I told the front desk ,they didn't even come to vacuum. They were all over the bathroom and ceiling by night. We moved to a new room. The next morning we spoke to manager,Sandeep. He said he was not responsible for bugs ,as long as he sprays rooms!!!! Would only offer to take half of one day off. .These bugs ruined my Coach bag and were in my suitcases and all he could say was "calm down"or I won't talk to you further. .THIS OBVIOUSLY IS HIS THING-"CALM DOWN". Once I showed him I had pics of the bugs, he immediately refunded half of our total bill! GO ELSEWHERE!!!!!! Or bring your camera!!

Reviews.Title: “Save yourself a headache!!!”
Reviews.Author: oob2kw
